block.p: GOODYEAR TIRE AND RUBBER CO., Akron, Ohio, named John Polhemus, head of the Latin American region, as president at its North American tire business. He succeeds William Sharp, who is retiring. Mr. Polhemus is succeeded by Chris Clark.
INTERNET CAPITAL GROUP, Wayne, Pa., named Doug Alexander, managing director for operations, to the post of chief executive for European business, as it expands outside the United States.
